summary.title: Professional Journey
content: I'm a Frontend Tech Lead and Architect with over 8 years of experience building modular and scalable UI systems. My work focuses on frontend architecture, design systems, and developer experience (DX).

At EFEX, I lead the frontend infrastructure, where I architect microfrontend-based platforms using Nx, React, and internal tools I've developed for release automation, quality control, and design token management.
My passion is crafting consistent, reusable experiences through thoughtful code, clear structure, and strategic componentization.
